CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Three kinds of donor - acceptor ( D-A ) type semiconducting copolymers in which electron donating units of dithienopyrrole ( DTP ) and accepting units of benzothiadiazole ( BT ) were connected with different numbers of thienyl spacers ( x = 0-2 ) were synthesized and used as electron donor materials in polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) combined with fullerene derivatives.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Dithienopyrrole (DTP) |
| Benzothiadiazole (BT) |
| Thienyl spacers |
| Fullerene derivatives |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my previous mistake. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Dithienopyrrole (DTP) |
| Benzothiadiazole (BT) |

I removed "thienyl spacers" and "fullerene derivatives" from the list as they do not clearly refer to specific material names.

These three entities are the material properties that are being discussed in the paragraph.
